title: History - NEMA
snippet: NEMA, created in the fall of 1926 by the merger of the Electric Power Club and the Associated Manufacturers of Electrical Supplies, provides a forum for the Standardization of electrical equipment, enabling consumers to select from a range of safe, effective, and compatible electrical products.
